title: Leveraging electronic health records to examine differential clinical outcomes in people with Alzheimer's Disease

abstract: BACKGROUND. Alzheimer's disease (AD) carries a high societal burden inequitably distributed across demographic groups. OBJECTIVE. To examine differences in readily ascertainable clinical outcomes of AD decline among demographic groups …

title: Pangu Ultra: Pushing the Limits of Dense Large Language Models on Ascend NPUs
details: Y Yin, W Huang, K Song, Y Tang, X Wu, W Guo, P Guo… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: We present Pangu Ultra, a Large Language Model (LLM) with 135 billion parameters and dense Transformer modules trained on Ascend Neural Processing Units (NPUs). Although the field of LLM has been witnessing unprecedented advances in pushing …
